articles.content: England are on the cusp of a memorable Test match win against India after its batters put them in the driver's seat at the end of the fourth day's play at Edgbaston in Birmingham. In-form batters Jon… [+2220 chars]

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Watch: 'Shut up and Bat' - Angry umpire scolds England great, video breaks internet in Edgbaston Test - Hindustan Times
articles.description: In the video, an angry umpire Kettleborough was heard saying to Broad: "Let us do the umpiring and you do the batting, alright? Otherwise, you are going to get into trouble again. Watch Video of England's Stuart Broad scolded by umpire Kettleborough at Edbast…
articles.content: A video of umpire Richard Kettleborough asking Stuart Broad to "get on with the batting and shut up" during the India vs England fifth Test at Edgbaston in Birmingham has gone viral. In the video, an… [+1730 chars]

articles.author: ESPNcricinfo staff
articles.title: New Zealand's female players get match-fee parity in new five-year deal - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Domestically and internationally the men and women will now be paid the same per match
articles.content: Sophie Devine on new deal: 'It's a massive step forward and will be a huge drawcard for young women and girls'  •  ICC via Getty
